languages.text: Множество голосов жителей нижних уровней сливается в единый гул — тревожный и подавляющий, как и окружающие катакомбы.

traits.locale_text: Множество голосов жителей нижних уровней сливается в единый гул — тревожный и подавляющий, как и окружающие катакомбы.

languages.text: The voices belonging to the many residents of the lower levels merge into a single humming noise — unnerving and oppressive, much like the surrounding catacombs.
languages.original_text: Множество голосов жителей нижних уровней сливается в единый гул — тревожный и подавляющий, как и окружающие катакомбы.

traits.locale_text: Hundreds of voices belonging to the residents of lower lowers merge together into one humming noise — unnerving and oppressive, much like the catacombs that surround them.
Hundreds of voices belonging to the residents of lower lowers merge together into one humming noise — unnerving and oppressive, much like the catacombs that surround them.
Hundreds of voices belonging to the residents of the lower levels merge together into one humming noise — unnerving and oppressive, much like the catacombs that surround them.
Hundreds of voices belonging to the residents of the lower levels merge together into one humming noise — unnerving and oppressive, much like the catacombs that surround them.
The voices belonging to the many residents of the lower levels merge into a single humming noise — unnerving and oppressive, much like the surrounding catacombs.

languages.text: 底层居民发出来的声音汇合在一起，变成了嗡嗡声。这个压抑的声音令你感到不安，仿佛这里变成了地下墓地一样。
languages.original_text: The voices belonging to the many residents of the lower levels merge into a single humming noise — unnerving and oppressive, much like the surrounding catacombs.

traits.locale_text: 底层居民发出来的声音汇合在一起，变成了嗡嗡声。这个压抑的声音令你感到不安，仿佛这里变成了地下墓地一样。

languages.text: Las voces de muchos de los residentes de los niveles inferiores se mezclan en un solo zumbido. Es enervante y opresor, como las catacumbas que te rodean.
languages.original_text: The voices belonging to the many residents of the lower levels merge into a single humming noise — unnerving and oppressive, much like the surrounding catacombs.

traits.locale_text: Las voces de muchos de los residentes de los niveles inferiores se mezclan en un solo zumbido. Es enervante y opresor, como las catacumbas que te rodean.

languages.text: 下階の多数の住民の声がハミングのようなひとつのノイズに溶け込んでいく。それは周囲の地下墓地と同じように、不気味さと圧迫感を感じる。
languages.original_text: The voices belonging to the many residents of the lower levels merge into a single humming noise — unnerving and oppressive, much like the surrounding catacombs.

traits.locale_text: 下階の多数の住民の声がハミングのようなひとつのノイズに溶け込んでいく。それは周囲の地下墓地と同じように、不気味さと圧迫感を感じる。

languages.text: Die Stimmen der vielen Bewohner der unteren Ebenen verschmelzen zu einem einzigen summenden Geräusch – verstörend und bedrückend, so wie die Katakomben selbst.
languages.original_text: The voices belonging to the many residents of the lower levels merge into a single humming noise — unnerving and oppressive, much like the surrounding catacombs.

traits.locale_text: Die Stimmen der vielen Bewohner der unteren Ebenen verschmelzen zu einem einzigen summenden Geräusch – verstörend und bedrückend, so wie die Katakomben selbst.

languages.text: Les voix des nombreux habitants des niveaux inférieurs se fondent en un seul et unique bourdonnement, dérangeant et oppressant, à l'instar des catacombes qui vous entourent.
languages.original_text: The voices belonging to the many residents of the lower levels merge into a single humming noise — unnerving and oppressive, much like the surrounding catacombs.

traits.locale_text: Les voix des nombreux habitants des niveaux inférieurs se fondent en un seul et unique bourdonnement, dérangeant et oppressant, à l'instar des catacombes qui vous entourent.

languages.text: Birçok alt seviye sakinine ait olan sesler birleşip tek bir uğultu meydana getiriyor. Bu ses, etraftaki mezarlar gibi sinirini bozuyor, seni boğuyor.
languages.original_text: The voices belonging to the many residents of the lower levels merge into a single humming noise — unnerving and oppressive, much like the surrounding catacombs.
